<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataPH extends data { const CODE = 'PH'; const PREFIX = 63; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '1800\d{7,9}|(?:2|[89]\d{4})\d{5}|[2-8]\d{8}|[28]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:(?:2[3-8]|3[2-68]|4[2-9]|5[2-6]|6[2-58]|7[24578])\d{3}|88(?:22\d\d|42))\d{4}|2\d{5}(?:\d{2})?|8[2-8]\d{7}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:81[37]|9(?:0[5-9]|1[0-24-9]|2[0-35-9]|[35]\d|4[235-9]|6[0-25-8]|7[1-9]|8[19]|9[4-9]))\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '1800\d{7,9}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d)(\d{5})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{4})(\d{4,6})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{5})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{4})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{4})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{4})(\d{1,2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
